name: The Quest
description: Christopher Booker's archetypal plot where the hero journeys to obtain a precious object or reach a goal
distribution_philosophy: Based on Booker's quest structure with emphasis on the journey and trials, following the classic adventure pattern
examples: Lord of the Rings, Indiana Jones, Finding Nemo

call_to_quest.name: Call to Quest
call_to_quest.description: The hero learns of a precious object or goal that must be obtained

preparation.name: Preparation and Departure
preparation.description: The hero prepares for the journey and gathers companions

journey_begins.name: Journey Begins
journey_begins.description: The hero sets out and faces initial challenges

trials_and_tests.name: Trials and Tests
trials_and_tests.description: The hero faces a series of increasingly difficult challenges

approach_goal.name: Approach to Goal
approach_goal.description: The hero nears the object of the quest and faces the greatest danger

final_ordeal.name: Final Ordeal
final_ordeal.description: The hero faces the ultimate challenge to obtain the goal

goal_achieved.name: Goal Achieved
goal_achieved.description: The hero obtains the object and returns transformed
